segments.text: Wow, I can't believe what I'm seeing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there, letting the water overflow like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed that she hasn't noticed the puddle growing around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, they're being so bold, taking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised she hasn't caught them yet, with all the noise they must be making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what's going through her mind, that she's so oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm shocked that she hasn't slipped and fallen already, with all that water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm she seems, like nothing is wrong at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really taken aback by the whole situation, to be honest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never expected to see something like this in a kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
